ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 156
ygData.msgSnippet: Gday Clarity, Borix/Minimus/Drexal/Sparx here. Good ta see ya round, you ve been pretty quiet recently. ... People tend to get a bit excited about items.  If
ygData.messageBody:
Gday Clarity, Borix/Minimus/Drexal/Sparx here. Good ta see ya round,
you've been pretty quiet recently.

>I'm sorry, but what are you talking about? Herrick is a level 12 monk talking
>about saving up scarab carapaces for 1.7gp each! Do you think this guy has
>30pp to go buy a bracer of erolisi? or 100pp to get a silver-plated bracer?
>Please tell me what armor better than cured even a level 18 can go get?
>
>I'm just a little tired of people who are twinked telling new players what
>they
>should be wearing:
>
>"oh, man, that cured hat sucks, go get a froglock crown"
>
>There is a lot better stuff that Harrick can get, but he definitely
>shouldn't worry
>about it now. He has to get to 30 or so first.
>
>
>Clarity Harvestmoon,
>Karana

People tend to get a bit excited about items. If you have the plat or
friends then twink away. Yes, it's kind of pathetic, but has anyone
looked at Oasis lately. Twink-o-rama. Get the gear yourself and
you'll like it more, buy or trade for it and you'll still be happy.
Just find it strange that people think item collection is the be-all
and end-all of the game.

>Dude, don't bother paying 50pp for Wu's, especially if you only have
>11. Wu's aren't that helpful. If I were you I would go for a Lockjaw
>vest and maybe some jewelry. Wait till later for wu's. I held out and
>found a guy selling them at cost, 19pp. My lucky day =)
>
>Also, at least on Karana, there are many high level tailors who will
>make them for nothing if you find the ingrediants. Just find a
>potter/enchanter for that vial of viscous mana, everything else is easy.
>
>Hammeron
>Monk of Quellious
>Karana

Open invitation to anyone on Karana: If you get the components I'll
enchant the vial for free. Be warned my pottery skill is nonexistsent
so you'll need to bring the components.


Sparx Dreamreaver
Level 36, Karana
- Resists'R'Us -
